DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate feasibility provide preliminary evidence efficacy 12-week contingency management intervention promote weight loss overweight obese low income adult community-based clinic . The study three primary goal : ( ) determine contingency management treatment effectively apply new application , weight loss ; ( b ) obtain preliminary evidence contingency management 's efficacy promote weight loss improve treatment retention , diet quality , physical activity level , self efficacy ; ( c ) identify barrier challenge implement contingency management weight loss among low income patient .
DOC.brief_title: Contingency Management Promote Weight Loss Low Income Adults
DOC.criteria: age 18 55 year body mass index kg/m2 ( BMI ) 25 39.9 rest blood pressure 90/60 140/90 ability speak English read 6th grade level willingness randomly assign one two group serious acute chronic medical problem may impact dietary exercise regimens psychiatric condition
